Cauvery Basins.Description:
An inventory of indigenous energy resources, both renewable and nonrenewable,will be developed and published by SEA and PRDS by end-2020.Air
borne gravity/magnetic data will be acquired and processed by end 2019 and 2D/
3D seismic data in selected locations in Mannar and Cauvery Basins will be
completed by 2022.

completed by 2022.
